title: Installation issue: casacore
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
 spack install casacore%gcc@5.5.0 fftw=True hdf5=True openmp=True python=True sofa=True

... # and the relevant part of the error message
==> Installing casacore
==> Searching for binary cache of casacore
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for casacore found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /mnt/storage-ssd/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/58/58eccc875053b2c6fe44fe53b6463030ef169597ec29926936f18d27b5087d63.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /tmp/cnlab/spack-stage/spack-stage-casacore-2.4.1-r6ehn2codnmamuv5v5xigecgcypzcu2x/v2.4.1.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /tmp/cnlab/spack-stage/spack-stage-casacore-2.4.1-r6ehn2codnmamuv5v5xigecgcypzcu2x
==> No patches needed for casacore
==> Building casacore [CMakePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:

'-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=FALSE' ### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux login-1 3.10.0-1062.12.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Feb 4 23:02:59 UTC 2020 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
